name: Loaded March
setup: Stand tall with load held suitcase (sides) or in rack/at chest
Stack ribs over pelvis; pack shoulders
steps: Lift one knee to ~hip height while balancing on the other foot
Pause briefly, then lower and switch legs
Keep torso tall; avoid leaning back or to the side
cues: Grow tall; zipper ribs to hips
safety: Choose a load that allows balance and posture. Reduce load or elevate to march against a wall/fingertip support if needed.

prescriptionHints.notes: Use as primer or accessory. Prioritize posture and balance.
